title: Sen. Lindsey Graham Tests Positive for Covid-19
sub_head: Case comes as lawmakers push to finalize a roughly $1 trillion bipartisan infrastructure bill
body:
WASHINGTON—Sen. Lindsey Graham (R., S.C.) has tested positive for Covid-19 despite being vaccinated and will quarantine for 10 days, he said Monday, raising concerns about the possible spread of the highly transmissible Delta variant on Capitol Hill.
Mr. Graham said he started feeling sick on Saturday night and went to the doctor Monday morning. Mr. Graham described his symptoms as mild—similar to a sinus infection—and credited the vaccine for ensuring he wasn’t more seriously ill.
“I am very glad I was vaccinated because without vaccination I am certain I would not feel as well as I do now,” Mr. Graham said. “My symptoms would be far worse.”
The news of his breakthrough case hit the Senate as lawmakers push to finalize a $1 trillion bipartisan infrastructure bill, with a series of amendment votes and procedural hurdles in the coming days.
Masking has become a partisan flashpoint on Capitol Hill. Republicans typically oppose mask mandates while Democrats have begun wearing face coverings again.
